data.meta_description: Browse all the upcoming Family And Kids events taking place in Glasgow
data.text:
Pollok United Community Football Sessions

Selected dates between 29th October 2023 - 22nd December 2024

Join Pollok United at Nethercraigs every Sunday for their Community Football Sessions, and get your child started on their football journey in a friendly and fun environment!

READ MORE

Celtic Park Stadium Tour

1st January 2024 - 30th June 2025

Experience the magic within, soak up the history and feel the passion at Celtic Park Stadium, Scotland's largest football stadium, on this one hour guided tour.

READ MORE

Good Move Glasgow Health Walks

1st January 2024 - 31st December 2024

Various Locations Glasgow

Good Move Glasgow's Health Walks are easy, fun and free. What's more, with over 50 walks taking place each week, there's bound to be one near you!

READ MORE

Journey

Selected dates between 3rd January 2024 - 22nd December 2024

Journey is one of Sharmanka Kinetic Theatre's two shows. It features a wide selection of kinetic sculptures including the most recent works by Eduard Bersudsky made in Scotland.

READ MORE

The Barras Market

Selected dates between 6th January 2024 - 22nd December 2024

With its iconic archways The Barras Market is a Glasgow institution, open to the public every weekend, come along and grab yourself a bargain or two!

READ MORE

Dogs Trust Dog Training Classes

Selected dates between 7th January 2024 - 29th December 2024

The Dogs Trust offer training classes for dogs at all stages of their lives, in a relaxed and enjoyable environment at Mount Vernon Community Hall!

READ MORE

All Ages Retro Gaming Sessions At R-CADE

Selected dates between 11th January 2024 - 1st December 2024

Get your game on at Glasgow's only family friendly retro gaming venue by booking one of their Retro Gaming Sessions!

READ MORE

Glasgow City Centre Walking Tour

13th January 2024 - 15th December 2024

This is a 1.5 hour tour that will take you around all the main sites of the city, giving you an excellent opportunity to find out about Glasgow's rich history and culture!

READ MORE

Glasgow Street Art Walking Tour

13th January 2024 - 15th December 2024

Glasgow City Centre

Immerse yourself in a different side to Glasgow on this unique street art and modern culture tour, a popular tour for those looking to go off the beaten track!

READ MORE

Saturday Art Club

Selected dates between 13th January 2024 - 21st December 2024

The Gallery of Modern Art holds a regular, drop in, Saturday Morning Art Club for 5 to 12 year olds!

READ MORE

The Market at Loch Lomond Shores

Selected dates between 4th February 2024 - 15th December 2024

Browse homemade treats, arts & crafts, artisan food & drink and local produce at Loch Lomond Shores' regular Market Days on the first and third Sunday each month!

READ MORE

Discover! Weekend Sessions

Selected dates between 10th February 2024 - 29th December 2024

Join The Burrell Collection each weekend for a free drop in family session where you can get hands on and find out more about the collection through crafts, music and object handling!

READ MORE

Park Lane Market

Selected dates between 3rd March 2024 - 1st December 2024

Park Lane Market is a pop-up market held on the first and last Sunday of each month in Shawlands, featuring a range of boutique stalls!

READ MORE

Mini Museum Explorers at The Burrell Collection

Selected dates between 21st March 2024 - 19th December 2024

Do you know an intrepid explorer who would love to get involved with a mix of structured and free play? Join The Burrell Collection for their Mini Museum Explorers sessions!

READ MORE

Boat Trips Helensburgh

30th March 2024 - 3rd November 2024

Join Boat Trips Helensburgh for a tour of the Clyde Estuary, round the Sugar Boat Wreck, to the Holy Loch, up the River Clyde, and a variety of other places!

READ MORE

Glasgow Music City Tours: Merchant City Tour

Selected dates between 30th March 2024 - 28th September 2024

Glasgow City Centre

Get under the skin of Glasgow's vibrant music scene with this entertaining, guided walking tour of Merchant City and the East End from Glasgow Music City Tours!

READ MORE

Secret Market GLA

Selected dates between 7th April 2024 - 1st December 2024

The Secret Market GLA, returns to The Hive Finnieston on the first Sunday of each month featuring a number of vendors selling boutique, quirky and contemporary goods!

READ MORE

Glasgow Tigers Speedway

Selected dates between 12th April 2024 - 20th September 2024

Glasgow Tigers matches are a great day out for the full family, seven riders compete in each team with 15 heats of adrenaline-filled racing providing a great nights entertainment for all!

READ MORE

Family Fun Sundays At The Grosvenor

Selected dates between 28th April 2024 - 29th September 2024

Come join the Family Fun at The Grosvenor, Ashton Lane every Sunday from Midday, it's free to attend, all you need is your party outfit!

READ MORE

The Dark Side Of Glasgow

1st May 2024 - 30th August 2024

Various Locations Glasgow

Want to know about Bible John? The Human Crocodile? The Gorbals Vampire? Arthur Thompson and his kin? Look no further! take a trip through Glasgow's macabre past with The Dark Side Tours!

READ MORE

Ibrox Stadium Tours - The Home of Rangers FC

28th May 2024 - 20th December 2024

Experience the magic of this world famous stadium with your very own 'access all areas' pass on a tour of Ibrox, the home of Rangers FC!

READ MORE

Castlemilk Park Buggy Walk

Selected dates between 7th June 2024 - 6th December 2024

Meet at Castlemilk Stables on the first Friday of each month for the Buggy Walk and explore Castlemilk Park and beyond!

READ MORE

Women On Wheels Balance Bike Group

Selected dates between 13th June 2024 - 19th December 2024

Women On Wheels' mother and toddler balance bike group on Thursday mornings at Queen's Park is designed to get the youngest ones comfortable with bikes!

READ MORE

Women On Wheels Family Cycling Sessions

Selected dates between 15th June 2024 - 21st December 2024

If you want to learn to cycle with your kids or build confidence cycling together as a family, these sessions from Women On Wheels are perfect for you!

READ MORE

Comics Stripped!

22nd June 2024 - 15th August 2024

Oor Wullie, Judge Dredd and Rupert the Bear are at the 'art' of a new exhibition which focuses on comic strips and creators at The Lillie Art Gallery in Milngavie!

READ MORE

Holmwood House Market

Selected dates between 23rd June 2024 - 24th November 2024

Holmwood House Market features a fantastic line up of top quality producers and makers bringing with them all kinds of wonderful foods, drinks, arts, crafts and artisan goods!

READ MORE

Flamingo Beach at Silverburn

24th June 2024 - 20th August 2024

Pink flamingos are flocking back to Glasgow for Summer as Silverburn prepares for the return of its Flamingo Beach, bigger and better for 2024!

READ MORE

Summer at the Science Centre

28th June 2024 - 1st September 2024

This summer, go beyond the ordinary at Glasgow Science Centre! Bring the whole family for an adventure-filled day of hands-on exhibits, fun workshops, and exciting shows!

READ MORE

Royal Conservatoire of Scotland Summer Schools

1st July 2024 - 16th August 2024

Direct a film, devise a play, take centre stage or make magic behind the scenes at the Royal Conservatoire of Scotland's Summer Schools!

READ MORE

The Loading Bay Skatepark Summer Camps

Selected dates between 1st July 2024 - 16th August 2024

Kids can enjoy an action packed day with a mix of activities including BMX, Skateboard, Scooter, Trampoline, Gymnastics and more at The Loading Bay Skatepark Summer Camps!

READ MORE

R-CADE Summer Retro Games

Selected dates between 2nd July 2024 - 18th August 2024

Book now and enjoy an hour of gaming in R-CADE's retro video game arcade over the Summer holidays... choose from over 1500 games across over 20 consoles from the last 40 years!

READ MORE

Summer Morning Cartoons & Games at R-CADE

Selected dates between 2nd July 2024 - 14th August 2024

Join R-CADE for the first hour of the day for some classic Saturday morning style cartoons and retro toys & games in their cafe!

READ MORE

R-CADE Retro Gaming Friendship Club

Selected dates between 5th July 2024 - 16th August 2024

Calling all game lovers ages 8-16... join R-CADE's 2-hour retro gaming event and make new friends!️ Staff will be on hand to set up lots of fun multiplayer games for you to play with other kids.

READ MORE

Beyond Van Gogh: The Immersive Experience

11th July 2024 - 26th August 2024

Immerse yourself in Van Gogh's artwork like you've never seen it before when Beyond Van Gogh: The Immersive Experience comes to the SEC Glasgow this summer!

READ MORE

Summer Family Fun at the Scottish Maritime Museum

11th July 2024 - 31st August 2024

The Scottish Maritime Museum (Denny Tank) has lined up some great family activities to help keep the children entertained over the summer holidays!

READ MORE

The Great Solar System Adventure

11th July 2024 - 31st August 2024

Bring the whole family and explore the wonders and perils of our Solar System in this breathtaking immersive adventure at Glasgow Science Centre's new fulldome 2D film!

READ MORE

Arcade Afternoons

Selected dates between 24th July 2024 - 16th August 2024

Enjoy unlimited play on all the Arcade Machines at Top Hat & Bishop including classics like Ghost Squad, OutRun2 and Tekken, as well as hundreds of new and classic console games!

READ MORE

Govanhill International Festival and Carnival

1st August 2024 - 11th August 2024

Glasgow South Side

The Govanhill International Festival and Carnival 2024 returns for its 8th year, celebrating creativity, solidarity, and liberation, from Thursday 1st August to Sunday 11th August!

READ MORE

Pedal 4 Poverty

1st August 2024 - 31st October 2024

Nationwide

Wherever you are and whatever the distance, join EMMS International in their cycling challenge this August, September and October!

READ MORE

LUSH Glasgow City Summer Product Making Workshops

Selected dates between 2nd August 2024 - 11th August 2024

Looking for a sweet treat? LUSH Glasgow City have got just the thing! Join them across the first two weekends in August for 30 minutes of sunshine to break up your day.

READ MORE

Loch Lomond Shores Continental Market

10th August 2024 - 11th August 2024

The Continental Market returns to Loch Lomond Shores on August 10th & 11th, expect to find tasty street food options, tempting sweet treats and a range of authentic craft offerings!

READ MORE

Merchant Square Market

Selected dates between 10th August 2024 - 15th December 2024

Spend a relaxing afternoon browsing the stalls at the fortnightly Merchant Square Market... featuring a selection of local producers and crafters there's something for everyone!

READ MORE

Piping Live!

10th August 2024 - 18th August 2024

Various Locations Glasgow

Piping Live!, Glasgow's International Piping Festival, will return for its 21st edition this summer with an eclectic calendar of events from Saturday 10th - Sunday 18th August!

READ MORE

St Enoch Centre Market

Selected dates between 10th August 2024 - 18th August 2024

LKP Markets & Events is delighted to be hosting a new market at St Enoch Centre, Glasgow on the weekends of August 10th & 11th and 17th & 18th!

READ MORE

North Kelvin Girls Only Camp

12th August 2024

North Kelvin Sports are running a one day, girls football camp on Monday 12th August and they would love to see you there!

READ MORE

Summer Tree Identification

15th August 2024

Join TCV Scotland for a fun and informative session learning how to identify different tree species and how to record them at Dawsholm Park!

READ MORE

Summer Tree Identification

15th August 2024

Join TCV Scotland for a fun and informative session learning how to identify different tree species and how to record them at Linn Park!

READ MORE

World Pipe Band Championships

16th August 2024 - 17th August 2024

Thousands of pipers and drummers are expected to compete for the ultimate prize in pipe band competition when the World Pipe Band Championships return to Glasgow Green on the 16th and 17th August!

READ MORE

New Victoria Gardens Open Day & Flower Show

17th August 2024

New Victoria Gardens will open to the public on Saturday 17th August for their annual Open Day & Flower Show!

READ MORE

Movie Brunch with the Snow Sisters

18th August 2024

Come along to Wish Upon A Star Kingdom for a magical morning at with the Snow Sisters at their sing along movie brunch!

READ MORE

St Philomena’s Family Fun Day

18th August 2024

St Philomena's have a day of fun for all the family lined up on Sunday 18th August and they can't wait to welcome you all back!

READ MORE

Ashton Lane Street Food Festival

24th August 2024 - 25th August 2024

Whether you're a foodie looking to try something new or just looking to enjoy a fun day out with friends and family, Ashton Lane Street Food Festival has something for everyone!

READ MORE

Bat Night at RSPB Scotland Loch Lomond

24th August 2024

Embrace the darkness and go in search of some nocturnal nature at RSPB Scotland Loch Lomond on Saturday 24th August!

READ MORE

Bute Highland Games

24th August 2024

Rothesay

Bute Highland Games return on Saturday 24th August with another packed programme of events for all the family to enjoy!

READ MORE

Ceilidh Tots

24th August 2024 - 25th August 2024

Come and join Ceilidh Tots for a mini Scottish traditional music concert for young children and their families at 29th Glasgow Scout Group on Saturday 24th & Sunday 25th August!

READ MORE

International Bat Night

24th August 2024

Join the countryside ranger for a twilight walk to track down the bats around Dams To Darnley Country Park, and find out all about these nocturnal creatures!

READ MORE

Springburn Community Street Festival

24th August 2024

The Springburn Community Street Festival is back again this year taking place on Saturday 24th August from 10am in Springburn Way!

READ MORE

Wasps Summer Artists & Makers Market

24th August 2024 - 25th August 2024

Join Wasps Artists' Studios at the Briggait for their annual Summer Market which will showcase the work of their studio holders from across Scotland!

READ MORE

William Jack - Live in Glasgow

24th August 2024

Enjoy a wonderful performance from William Jack, a multi-style Cellist and song writer from South Australia, at St Brides Episcopal Church on Saturday 24th August!

READ MORE

Drawing Fantasy Creatures (Age 10-15)

25th August 2024

Join Abacus Coffee for a fun and creative afternoon where young artists can let their imaginations run wild on this Drawing Fantasy Creatures workshop!

READ MORE

Family Tekken Tournament

25th August 2024

Think you've got what it takes to be the King of Iron Fist? Join R-CADE for a Family Tekken Tag Tournament over several different platforms with both games from the spin off series!

READ MORE

Off The Beatson Track

25th August 2024

This summer Beatson Cancer Charity's annual 10k walk 'Off The Beatson Track' will be returning for its 11th year taking place on Sunday 25th August!

READ MORE

Scottish Invertebrate Show

25th August 2024

Invert Shows UK return to Scotland with their Invertebrate Show on Sunday 25th August where you can meet and purchase a variety of weird and wonderful bugs!

READ MORE

Wylie & Lochhead Exhibition

26th August 2024 - 19th September 2024

Wylie & Lochhead were the most successful furniture manufacturer in Scotland, an exhibition exploring their history is being held at the Mitchell Library between 26th August and 19th September.

READ MORE

Chitty Chitty Bang Bang

27th August 2024 - 8th September 2024

Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, the most fantasmagorical musical of all time, flies into the King's Theatre Glasgow for two weeks only in 2024!

READ MORE

The Family Wellbeing Hub

29th August 2024

The Family Wellbeing Hub is your one-stop destination to discover the array of support available to you and your family across Glasgow.

READ MORE

Chest Heart & Stroke Scotland: Zip Slide the Clyde

31st August 2024

Explore new heights and join Chest Heart & Stroke Scotland for an exhilarating challenge which will see you zipline along the Clyde from a crane next to the iconic Glasgow Riverside Museum!

READ MORE

Kirkintilloch Canal Festival

31st August 2024 - 1st September 2024

Kirkintilloch

The annual Kirkintilloch Canal Festival promises a fantastic mix of family fun, live music, fireworks, family fun and boat trips – culminating on Saturday 31st August and Sunday 1st September!

READ MORE

Glasgow Walk to Beat Blood Cancer

1st September 2024

Walk in memory of a loved one or to celebrate a life saved on the annual Glasgow Branch Walk to Beat Blood Cancer on Sunday 1st September!

READ MORE

Scotland’s Gardens Scheme Open Garden: Horatio’s Garden

1st September 2024

Horatio's Garden Glasgow, designed by acclaimed garden designer and RHS judge, James Alexander-Sinclair, will be open to the public on Sunday 1st September as part of Scotland's Garden Scheme!

READ MORE

Scottish Geology Festival

1st September 2024 - 6th October 2024

Nationwide

Learn about the incredible stories hidden within Scotland's rocks when the Scottish Geology Festival returns for 2024 between September 1st and October 6th!

READ MORE

The Show for Young Men

3rd September 2024

The Show For Young Men is a tender and moving new contemporary dance piece, co-created and performed by Alfie, a 10-year-old boy, and Robbie Synge, a 40-something-year-old male dancer.

READ MORE

Silent Comedy Classics

4th September 2024

Get ready for an evening of pure cinematic magic! as Gladstone's Bag return to the Britannia Panopticon with two silent comedy classics accompanied by live musical orchestra!

READ MORE

Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse - Live In Concert

4th September 2024

The second instalment of the Oscar-winning Spider-Verse saga, whose soundtrack has become an award-winning phenomenon, is brought to life in concert at Glasgow Royal Concert Hall!

READ MORE

Southside Wellbeing Festival

6th September 2024 - 8th September 2024

Glasgow South Side

The Southside Wellbeing Festival returns between the 6th & 8th September, showcasing the amazing wellbeing services, products and events that happen across the Southside!

READ MORE

Clydebuilt Festival

7th September 2024 - 8th September 2024

Back for 2024, the Clydebuilt Festival will return to the Riverside Museum and on the Clyde on Saturday 7th and Sunday 8th September!

READ MORE

Drumchapel Panto Group Family Fun Day

7th September 2024

Get ready for a day filled with laughter, excitement and unforgettable memories at Drumchapel Panto Group's Family Fun Day on Saturday 7th September!

READ MORE

Free Family Workshop: Traditional Japanese Cuisine for Planetary Health

7th September 2024 - 14th September 2024

Are you a family living in Glasgow or the Central Belt? Join us to take part in a University of Glasgow research project about food consciousness, Japanese tradition and eating for planetary health.

READ MORE

Loch Lomond Food & Drink Festival

7th September 2024 - 8th September 2024

The Loch Lomond Food & Drink Festival is an amazing weekend out for all the family featuring music, cookery, real ale, fresh produce and lots of fun!

READ MORE

Milngavie Street Party

7th September 2024

Milngavie

Milngavie Street Party have joined forces with Melting Pot to bring an incredible day and night of music and DJ's to their annual event!

READ MORE

Clydebuilt Festival Dragon Boat Race - CANCELLED

8th September 2024

The Dragon Boat Race on the River Clyde will take place on Sunday 8th September as part of the annual Clydebuilt Festival!

READ MORE

The Flock and Moving Cloud

13th September 2024

Scottish Dance Theatre will set the stage on fire with two of their most physically daring and dynamic works in an unforgettable evening of dance at Platform Glasgow!

READ MORE

Pride Over Prejudice

17th September 2024 - 21st September 2024

Various Locations Glasgow

During the course of Pride Over Prejudice 2024, The PI's community arts team will work with young people aged 9-16, in weekly workshop groups across five areas of Glasgow!

READ MORE

Glasgow Cathedral Festival: Tommy Smith

20th September 2024

The cloistered crypt takes on a dense and moody tone—creating a place of sanctuary. Sit back and let your mind wander along with flexuous melodies improvised by jazz legend Tommy Smith.

READ MORE

Monster Jam Ramped Up!

20th September 2024 - 22nd September 2024

Experience the all-new Monster Jam Ramped Up! when it comes to Glasgow's OVO Hydro between the 20th and 22nd of September... don't miss ramped up fun for the whole family!

READ MORE

Scotland’s Memory Walk

20th September 2024 - 22nd September 2024

Nationwide

Be a hero in purple and join thousands of others for Alzheimer Scotland's Memory Walk this September!

READ MORE

Doors Open Days: Scottish Mask and Puppet Centre

21st September 2024 - 22nd September 2024

The doors will be open for a warm welcome from all at the Scottish Mask and Puppet Centre as part of this year's Doors Open Days events!

READ MORE

Glasgow Cathedral Festival: Pierrot Lunaire

21st September 2024

Poet, jester, and muse. Much-loved GCF artists Hebrides Ensemble and Stephanie Lamprea unite for this brilliant performance of nightmares and dreams, exploring ideas of Pierrot Lunaire new and old.

READ MORE

Princess Play and a Picnic with Rapunzel

21st September 2024

Join Wish Upon A Star Kingdom this September for an exciting performance with Rapunzel. Join her on an adventure through her story with lots of singing, dancing and adventure.

READ MORE

Two Step: Exhibition

21st September 2024 - 11th January 2025

For their exhibition at Platform Glasgow, Beth and Fraser will utilise the vast scale of the exhibition wall and site specific areas around the building to celebrate their two-step collaborations.

READ MORE

Glasgow Cathedral Festival: Katherine Dienes-Williams

22nd September 2024

From the swinging razzamataz of Broadway to the lilting folksongs of the Hebrides, Katherine Dienes-Williams offers something for everyone in this lunchtime concert playing our 1879 pipe organ.

READ MORE

ACME Comic Con

28th September 2024 - 29th September 2024

If you're a fan of movies, comics, video games, sci-fi, anime or cosplay you cannot miss the ACME Comic Con when it return to the SEC Glasgow on Saturday 28th and Sunday 29th September!

READ MORE

Big Feed In The Park

28th September 2024 - 29th September 2024

The Big Feed and Melting Pot are teaming up for another street party which will see them takeover Kelvin Way and the Kelvingrove Bandstand on the September Weekend!

READ MORE

MS Walk Glasgow

28th September 2024

MS Walk Glasgow is back for 2024! Being held at Glasgow Green on Saturday 28th September, join in and walk, roll or stroll to help stop MS!

READ MORE

Glasgow Memory Walk

29th September 2024

Scotland's Memory Walk is all about celebrating the people we love while raising vital funds for dementia, join Alzheimer Scotland for their Glasgow Memory Walk on Sunday 29th September.

READ MORE

AJ Bell Junior and Mini Scottish Run

5th October 2024

Get the whole family active by joining the Great Scottish Run's family friendly activities in George Square on Saturday 5th October!

READ MORE

National Fungus Day Foray

5th October 2024

Join in as we explore the woods looking for these weird and wonderful organisms that can provide food, while others can be deadly!

READ MORE

The Little Children’s Market Scotland - Glasgow

5th October 2024

The Little Children's Market Scotland is so pleased to announce their first ever MEGA event will be held at Glasgow Club Scotstoun on Saturday 5th October!

READ MORE

AJ Bell Great Scottish Run

6th October 2024

The AJ Bell Great Scottish Run is an incredible weekend of running that includes a 10k & half marathon on Sunday 6th October and Junior & Mini event on Saturday 5th October!

READ MORE

Acting Skills (Secondary 4-6) Short Course

Selected dates between 8th October 2024 - 15th April 2025

This new acting skills class for Secondary 4-6 from the Royal Conservatoire of Scotland will be an introductory course to the basics of acting.

READ MORE

Musical Theatre Skills (Secondary 1-3) Short Course

Selected dates between 9th October 2024 - 16th April 2025

This new 10-week Musical Theatre class from the Royal Conservatoire of Scotland will focus on establishing skills in acting, singing, and dancing.

READ MORE

Musical Theatre Skills (Secondary 4-6) Short Course

Selected dates between 9th October 2024 - 16th April 2025

This new credit-rated Secondary 4-6 course will establish students' skills in the art of Musical Theatre at Royal Conservatoire of Scotland.

READ MORE

Titanic Exhibition: Glasgow

12th October 2024 - 27th October 2024

Explore the Titanic story as you've never seen before! Combining unique immersive experiences with genuine artefacts, don't miss out on this unforgettable exhibition when it comes to Glasgow!

READ MORE

Black History Month: Discover African Art Workshop

13th October 2024

Find your favourite objects in the African Art Collection and make your own mixed media Art in response at Kelvingrove Art Gallery & Museum!

READ MORE

Tattie Holidays Adventures

13th October 2024

Explore Dams To Darnley Country Park with your budding young naturalists - hunt for fascinating plants, amazing insects and shy birds and mammals, and do some nature crafts as you go!

READ MORE

Taylormania

Selected dates between 14th October 2024 - 18th May 2025

Katy Ellis a self obsessed 'Swiftie' with an incredible live band and dancers promises to deliver the most authentic recreation of a Taylor Swift show you will ever see at The Pavilion Theatre!

READ MORE

Giants Live World Tour Finals

19th October 2024

12 of the STRONGEST men on the planet! 7 EPIC events! 1 JAW-DROPPING Tour Finale! Don't miss the Giants Live World Tour Finals at The OVO Hydro, Glasgow on 21st October!

READ MORE

Twilight In Concert: The Film With Live Band

23rd October 2024

The legendary romance fantasy film Twilight is coming to The Glasgow Royal Concert Hall as part of a UK tour, just ahead of Halloween, accompanied by a live band and surrounded with candles!

READ MORE

Art Car Boot Sale

26th October 2024 - 27th October 2024

Art Car Boot Sale, Scotland's largest contemporary art market, travels to Tramway for a Southside iteration. Come along and discover and purchase works from a host of talented contemporary artists!

READ MORE

Royal Scottish National Orchestra: The Haunted Concert Hall

26th October 2024

You can expect lots of spooktacular treats from the RSNO and the Youth Chorus with this spine-tingling concert for the whole family at Glasgow Royal Concert Hall!

READ MORE

The Big Halloween Kids Comedy Show

26th October 2024

A brand new unpredictable Halloween Comedy show for the whole family filled with nonsense, games, stand up, improv, competitions and JUST a little bit of splatter with the laughter!

READ MORE

Kingdom Halloween Party

27th October 2024

Bring your most faBOOlous costumes and join Wish Upon A Star Kingdom for an unforgettable adventure at their Kingdom Halloween Party!

READ MORE

Not So Scary Halloween Party

27th October 2024

Calling all brave little souls, put on your best costumes and join Wish Upon A Star Kingdom for an unforgettable adventure at their Not So Scary Halloween Party!

READ MORE

Rave’n Ball & Market

31st October 2024

Glasgow's Witch Market and Edinburgh's Alternative Night Market have collaborated to bring you a night of debauchery under the moon and stars!

READ MORE

Wizard School

2nd November 2024

Join Wish Upon A Star Kingdom for a wonderful wizarding weekend of potions, house sorting, activities and spellbinding entertainment for all ages this season in the Kingdom!

READ MORE

Disney’s Aladdin

6th November 2024 - 30th November 2024

Experience Disney's spectacular Broadway and West End musical Aladdin on its UK and Ireland Tour, flying in on a magic carpet to the Theatre Royal Glasgow in November 2024!

READ MORE

That Feeling When

8th November 2024 - 9th November 2024

That Feeling When is a dance theatre production with live music that asks how the seasons can be a guide to what feels good in the cycle of teen-hood.

READ MORE

Musicals - The Ultimate Live Band Sing-Along

10th November 2024

Get ready to unleash your inner star and experience the magic of the musicals like never before when Musicals - The Ultimate Live Band Sing-Along comes to The Pavilion Theatre Glasgow!

READ MORE

101 Dalmatians

12th November 2024 - 16th November 2024

Direct from London comes the smash hit family musical 101 Dalmatians, you'd be barking mad to miss it at the King's Theatre Glasgow in November 2024!

READ MORE

Peter Panto And The Incredible Stinkerbell

22nd November 2024 - 5th January 2025

With plenty of swashbuckling shenanigans to be had, don't miss this year's Tron Pantomime... Peter Panto And The Incredible Stinkerbell!

READ MORE

Build a Snowman With the Snow Sisters

23rd November 2024

Do you want to build a snowman? Then come along to Wish Upon A Star Kingdom this November for a magical event with the snow sisters in their brand new winter wear!

READ MORE

Peter Pan

23rd November 2024 - 5th January 2025

Join Peter Pan and the characters you know and love when this swashbuckling J M Barrie pantomime adventure, starring Elaine C Smith and Johnny Mac, comes to the King's Theatre Glasgow!

READ MORE

Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

23rd November 2024 - 24th November 2024

Snow White & the Seven Dwarfs, a traditional family Pantomime by Maggie Harkness-Smith is the 3rd pantomime performed by the Drumchapel Pantomime Group at the GoodYear Social Club in Drumchapel!

READ MORE
